vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Output: cur_pos | Current location is computed from Estimated Position
Output: nav_cmd | it sends signal to navigation only if it's in flying modes'
Radio receives data from remote communication channel if there is a request
Without a request, no radio data is available
if no op or abort command have received then delivery status gets re-started
If delivery command is issued, delivery status is different from NOT_STARTED

vdm_lustre:assume.vdm_lustre:name: Delivery locations set through bus1 are never off-limits locations

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: P7: The drone never initiates packet release to an off-limits location
